content:
IWithInternetFrontend.DefinePublicFrontend Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.dll

In this Article

Begins the update of a load balancer frontend. The definition must be completed with a call to LoadBalancerPublicFrontend.UpdateDefinitionStages.WithAttach.attach().

public Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancerPublicFrontend.UpdateDefinition.IBlank<Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.LoadBalancer.Update.IUpdate> DefinePublicFrontend (string name);
Parameters
name
String

The name for the frontend.

Returns
IBlank<IUpdate>

To be added.
